item.description:
My first Meet-up as Asst. Organizer!

The weather looks good for next Saturday so come on out to Revere Beach for a kite festival. The turnout should be good and arriving early will give us the opportunity to capture pre-flight activities as well as kites in the sky.

The event begins at 9:00 AM. We can shoot 9:00 - Noon and anyone who wishes can remain and make it a full beach day. There's free street parking but keep in mind if it's a "beach day", spaces near the event may fill up fairly early.

If you're up early, come for breakfast at Santorini's. I'll be there at 8:00 am for pancakes. Let me know if you want to meet early by answering the question when you RSVP or post on the message board.

Hope you can make it!

Here's a little more info:
http://www.seasidekit...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet 9:00 AM at the sea wall directly across from Santorini's
item.name: Revere Beach Kite Festival
